column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I thought I'd give at least the food at Bosscat another chance and did takeout.  The hostesses were just as indifferent as they were last time
column2: though the food was pretty good.  The Bosscat burger was a hit
column3: and I really liked their fries with special ketchup.  The red velvet churros were very good too.
